settings.keyvalue: Get to the Core of Skin Concerns

settings.review: "This skin analyser is great!! I was able to see that my skin is naturally more oily (the colour chart helps you see what the different appearances mean). Because of this I’m able to buy more suitable skincare to match my skins needs and already seeing improvements in my skin! I love this it’s SO helpful, I’d 100% recommend getting this! 5 stars from me!"

"This skin analyzer is one of the coolest beauty tools I've used...Different skin concerns light up different colors. Do make sure the lights in the room are completely off when you use it! Prior to using this skin analyzer, I knew that I had lots of oil on my face, specifically comedones on my chin, but I didn't realize there were SO MANY around my nose, cheeks, and forehead too (so basically my whole face). I'm planning on doing treatments to steam and extract those as well as get facials to target oil, sebum, dead skin trapped in my pores...I really like that not only do I get to see what problems my skin has, I can also test the efficacy of skincare products by checking my skin's progress with the analyzer when I use new products. Overall, super happy with this product. Definitely a must-have if you're looking to improve your skincare journey!"

"This is a total game changer for my skin! I love being able to see exactly what is causing my skin issues and treat the root of the problem. This is such cool technology and I highly recommend this to anyone who struggles with their skin to grab one of these asap!!"

"I loved trying this device out. I have never used anything like it before. Very interesting seeing all of the imperfections in your skin, that your eyes alone couldn't show you. Works even better than I had expected. Once I saw how good it was working I literally used it on all of my family members. We all loved it."
"I was shocked at how much the analyser highlighted my pores and how large they are. It made me realize that I need to focus my skincare more on minimizing them. Great product!"
"Loved how this was able to let me see exactly what my skin was lacking and what it needed. Definitely saw that I need to exfoliate more often and use sunscreen!"

settings.subheading: What Our Influencers Are Loving About The Epiphany Skin Analyzer

settings.heading: How does the Epiphany Skin Analyzer work ?
settings.row_content:
The Epiphany Skin Analyzer uses UVA lights to highlight areas of your skin that may need your attention.

For the most accurate results, it's best to use your Epiphany in a darker environment. Bright lighting can wash out the glow, making it difficult to see your results clearly. A dimmer space will allow them to stand out more, giving you a better understanding of your skin’s unique needs.

settings.heading: I heard that UV light is bad for your skin. Is this safe ?
settings.row_content:
UV light is naturally occurring in sunlight, helps our skin produce Vitamin D (which is essential to your health), and can help treat a variety of skin conditions and diseases. Contrary to popular narratives, UV light is inherently good for your skin and has an extensive list of benefits.

While it is true that UVA light can contribute to skin aging and skin damage with prolonged exposure, the levels used in the Epiphany Skin Analyzer are minimal (UVA's are the least intense form of UV radiation compared to UVB's and UVC's) and intended for brief, focused use. The risk is significantly lower than what you’d experience from prolonged sun exposure or tanning beds. Your skin’s health is our top priority! The benefits of occasional skin analysis incorporated into your skincare routine can outweigh the cost of using skincare products that you don't actually need or may be harmful to your body holistically. We recommend using the Epiphany with intention.

settings.heading: Why won't my Epiphany turn on ?
settings.row_content:
To turn on your Epiphany, hold down the 'Power' button for 3 seconds. To turn it off, press the 'Power' button once.

If you are still having trouble turning on your Analyzer, make sure it is charged.

For further assistance, contact us at: support@earthsunocean.com.

settings.heading: How do I charge my Skin Analyzer ?
settings.row_content:
On the bottom of the Epiphany is a USB-C charging port. A charging cable is included with your purchase.

When the Epiphany is actively charging, the charging light will be blue, and when fully charged, it will turn green. Ensure that the USB-C is fully inserted into the Analyzer.

settings.heading: I have concerns about what I see under my Analyzer. What should I do ?
settings.row_content:
If you have any health concerns about something discovered under your Skin Analyzer, we highly recommend doing your own research. You can also contact your Dermatologist or Doctor if necessary.

We are not medical professionals.
